p: The carbohydrate contents in D.Â dewevrei leaves and fruits were also remarkable. Carbohydrate forms a major class of naturally occurring organic compounds which are vital for the upkeep of life in both plants and animals and also offer raw materials for many industries (Ebunoluwa, Adetanwa, Olabisi, & Sina, 2007). This suggests that D. dewevrei might be a good source of concentrated dietary energy.
